title: pAdamalarE tanjam
sahitya:
pAdamalarE tanjam amba unadu pAdamalarE tanjam


anupallavi

  Adi antam aTra janana maraNa upAdiyAl metta varundinEnuk-kunadu


caraNam    amba enadu arivu vanda nAL mudal agamagizhndunnAl-ayandOrum vandu
 shemponnaDi vaNangi Adip-pUrat-tirunnADoru maruNADi aDaindEn
 shrI jagadIshvari kAyArOhaNa nAthan magizhum nIlAyatAkSi shiva
 rAjadhAni nigar vAzhum nAyaki rAjarAjEshvari paramEshvari
